posts.post_content: This may not be [Lingering Souls](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lingering Souls), but on the bright side, I only have to splash three colors rather than four in my [Burning Vengeance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burning Vengeance) build.
